library(dplyr)
openvc <- read.csv("OpenVC.csv")
usVC <- openvc %>% filter(grepl("United States", Global.HQ))
api_key <- "API_KEY"
library(ggmap)
register_google(api_key)
head(usVC.withloc <- usVC %>% mutate_geocode(Global.HQ, output="latlona"))[c("address", "lon", "lat")]
library(leaflet)
library(OpenStreetMap)
library(sf)
usVC.sf <- st_as_sf(usVC.withloc %>% filter(!is.na(lon)),  coords=c("lon", "lat"), crs = 4326)
(m <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>% 
  addProviderTiles("OpenStreetMap.HOT", group = "Humanitarian") %>% 
  addTiles(options = providerTileOptions(noWrap = TRUE), group = "Default") %>% 
  # addMarkers(lng = dhaka_long, lat = dhaka_lat, popup='Dhaka') %>% 
  # addRectangles(bbox_val[[1]], bbox_val[[2]], bbox_val[[3]], bbox_val[[4]]) %>%
  addMarkers(data=usVC.sf, clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions()))
